attributes.action: put a ceiling on what freeholders can charge lessees for lease extensions to leased properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A proposal of say 1% of the property value per 100 years extension, therefore a property with a market value of £300,000 requiring an additional 100 years lease extension would cost the lessee a maximum of £3,000 or an additional 200 years would cost the lessee a maximum £6,000
